mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(member_id, email, password, name, age, gender, visibility, grade, regdate, nickname, likes_count, profile_path, favorite) VALUES (member_id_seq.nextval, #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{visibility}, 6, sysdate, '아무개', 0, 'defaultImage.jpg', 0)
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where email=#{email}

SELECT a.movie_id, a.title, a.release_date, round(a.tmdb_vote_sum / 2, 2) as tmdb_vote_sum, a.poster_path FROM movie a JOIN wish w on a.movie_id = w.movie_id WHERE w.member_id = #{member_id} order by w.regdate
SELECT a.movie_id, a.title, a.release_date, round(a.tmdb_vote_sum / 2, 2) as tmdb_vote_sum, a.poster_path FROM movie a JOIN rating r on a.movie_id = r.movie_id WHERE r.member_id = #{member_id}
